name: Honeymoon in the North of Vietnam 7 days
description: Begin your new life in one of the most gorgeous and romantic places in the world and in the picturesque capital of Vientam. Halong Bay is considered as one of the 7 wonders of nature, in addition it was declared as World Heritage Site by UNESCO. Hanoi is also a good place to discover with your couple and experiencing new sensations by trying new meals, and learning about Hanoian lifestyle. All in all, these are incomparable environments for enjoying the honeymoon with your beloved on board of an elegant junk and in a wonderful city. Besides of being delight with the romantic ambient you will take part in many interesting and fun activities in order to live a full experience in the North of Vietnam.
